chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: The &productName; tool-chain is based on the FractalADL framework. So the &productName; tool-chain is itself a component-based application written in Java .

The &productName; tool-chain is composed of several modules :
ADL and IDL parsers defines the grammars of the two languages.
ADL and IDL frontends contains components for the verification and the enhancement of ADL and IDL files.
ADL and IDL backends contains components for the generation and the compilation of C sourceCode.
Common frontend and backend contains components shared by ADL and IDL frontend and backend modules.
cpl-preproc : the specialized C preprocessor.
fractal-runtime : the source code of the minimal runtime required by fractal components.
mindc : The integration module that contains the main class of the mindc command.
